ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Eric A. Bowie ** RETIREMENTAND ANNUITY ** Tax Court Canada
PrecisRetirement and granting of a lifelong annuity to the Hon. ERIC A. BOWIE, a Judge of the Tax Court of Canada, effective November 12, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
